title: Botbuilder config schema
description: The schema for botbuilder configuration file

subsystemPackage.title: The subsystem package
subsystemPackage.description:
The path to the folder where subsystems should be placed, rooted at the source folder.
`{BASE_PACKAGE}` is the package containing Main.java

commandPackage.title: The normal command package
commandPackage.description:
The path to the folder where normal commands should be placed, rooted at the source folder.
`{BASE_PACKAGE}` is the package containing Main.java

instantCommandPackage.title: The instant command package
instantCommandPackage.description:
The path to the folder where instant commands should be placed, rooted at the source folder.
`{BASE_PACKAGE}` is the package containing Main.java

autoCommandPackage.title: The autonomous command package
autoCommandPackage.description:
The path to the folder where autonomous commands should be placed, rooted at the source folder.
`{BASE_PACKAGE}` is the package containing Main.java

instantAutoCommandPackage.title: The autonomous and instant command package
instantAutoCommandPackage.description:
The path to the folder where auto and instant commands should be placed, rooted at the source folder.
`{BASE_PACKAGE}` is the package containing Main.java

baseClassName.title: The name of the base class
baseClassName.description: The name of the class considered to at the base of the code

srcFolder.title: The source folder
srcFolder.description: The path to the folder containing source code, relative to the workspace root

buildFolder.title: The build folder
buildFolder.description: The path to the folder containing built source code, relative to the workspace root

testFolder.title: The test folder
testFolder.description: The path to the folder containing test code`, relative to the workspace root
